titles.title: Virginia Wilderness Additions Act of 2025
Virginia Wilderness Additions Act of 2025
Virginia Wilderness Additions Act of 2025
A bill to designate additions to the Rough Mountain Wilderness and the Rich Hole Wilderness of the George Washington National Forest, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Reported by Senator Boozman without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 213.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
